name: order-system
description: 訂單管理系統 - 專為蔬果飲品店設計

scripts.dev:full: echo '請分別在三個終端中執行: npm run dev:server, npm run dev:client, npm run dev:pos'
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:pos
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:pos: cd pos-system && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm run install-client && npm run install-pos
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.railway-build: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/build && rm -rf pos-system/build && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf pos-system/node_modules
